document_data.name: Kyristan's Mysteries
document_data.author: [[Kyristan]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Kyristan's Mysteries''''' was an [[arcane]] [[spellbook]] penned by the [[lich]] and skilled [[necromancer]] [[Kyristan]]. It contained a plethora of notes covering Kyristan's detailed research into his exploration of undeath. The tome also contained four unusual necromantic spells.
document_data.Description: This large tome measured {{SI|2|ft|long=yes}} on each side and was {{SI|6|in|long=yes}} thick. The pages were made from bone with the writing inscribed in blood. The writing in the tome could not be removed by any means. The tome's spine was in fact an actual spine, complete with short ribs encircling the perimeter of the book.
document_data.History: ''Kyristan's Mysteries'' was last seen around the Year of the Bow, [[1354 DR]], in [[Suzail]] where it was stolen from the [[Lark]].
document_data.Powers:
